<h3 id="X12649">X(12649)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: OUTER-YFF TANGENTS TO EXCENTERS-MIDPOINTS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-2*(b+c)*a^3-2*b*c*a^2+2*(b^3+c^3)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a/(1 - sec A) - b/(1 - sec B) - c/(1 - sec C) : :
<br>
<b>
X(12649) = 2*X(1)-3*X(11240) = 3*X(2)-4*X(1210) = 9*X(2)-8*X(6700) = 3*X(78)-4*X(6700) = 3*X(1210)-2*X(6700) = 5*X(3617)-4*X(6736)
</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(10).</p>
<p>X(12649) lies on these lines: {1,2}, {4,912}, {7,2475}, {11,12635}, {20,3218}, {21,3488}, {29,1069}, {40,11920}, {57,4190}, {63,950}, {65,3434}, {69,5016}, {72,2478}, {75,5738}, {81,5716}, {100,1788}, {144,5809}, {149,151}, {224,2900}, {225,11851}, {226,6871}, {273,5174}, {307,3875}, {329,5046}, {346,8557}, {354,5794}, {355,3555}, {376,11015}, {377,942}, {382,12690}, {388,3873}, {405,12433}, {411,944}, {452,3219}, {496,5730}, {497,3869}, {515,12687}, {517,6836}, {518,1837}, {758,1479}, {894,5807}, {908,5187}, {946,6870}, {952,3149}, {956,11344}, {1056,3889}, {1058,3877}, {1068,1897}, {1229,4696}, {1265,4358}, {1320,6943}, {1331,1724}, {1445,4848}, {1446,6604}, {1478,3874}, {1482,6831}, {1512,5534}, {1895,5081}, {1936,7538}, {1993,3562}, {2098,5855}, {2099,3813}, {2287,5839}, {2476,3487}, {2550,5178}, {2551,3681}, {2802,12750}, {2899,3952}, {2975,3486}, {3057,10936}, {3091,5804}, {3146,9799}, {3152,3210}, {3243,9578}, {3254,7319}, {3452,3984}, {3485,11680}, {3583,3901}, {3585,3894}, {3711,9711}, {3832,5715}, {3871,5657}, {3876,5084}, {3885,6865}, {3895,11362}, {3911,4855}, {3913,11510}, {3927,11113}, {3940,4187}, {3951,12572}, {4018,12699}, {4188,5435}, {4189,4313}, {4304,4652}, {4430,6894}, {4452,5932}, {4661,5815}, {4863,5836}, {4881,5265}, {5057,5225}, {5059,10430}, {5141,5226}, {5154,5748}, {5177,11036}, {5249,11518}, {5279,5802}, {5440,6921}, {5603,6828}, {5698,11684}, {5708,11112}, {5720,6953}, {5727,6762}, {5731,11012}, {5758,6840}, {5761,6830}, {5770,6906}, {5777,6957}, {5787,10431}, {5818,6991}, {5844,6922}, {5846,12595}, {5887,10531}, {6224,10074}, {6585,11491}, {6601,7672}, {6855,10595}, {6864,10597}, {6897,10202}, {6918,12001}, {6933,11374}, {6988,7967}, {7466,7718}, {7991,10971}, {10524,10826}, {10804,12195}, {10835,12410}, {10879,12495}, {10912,10949}, {10931,12627}, {10932,12628}, {10950,10966}, {11401,12135}, {11682,12053}, {11883,12454}, {11884,12455}, {11915,12626}, {11957,12636}, {11958,12637}, {12047,12559}</p>
<p>
X(12649) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (8,10573), (78,1210), (3436,1837), (5730,496), (6224,10074), (11415,1479), (11682,12053)<br>
X(12649) = isogonal conjugate of X(34430)<br>
X(12649) = complement of X(20013)<br>
X(12649) = anticomplement of X(78)<br>
X(12649) = X(8)-of-outer-Yff-tangents-triangle<br>
X(12649) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,6734,2), (1,10916,10527), (4,3868,5905), (7,5175,2475), (8,145,12648), (8,938,2), (8,6764,3621), (10,3870,10528), (63,950,6872), (72,5722,2478), (78,1210,2), (145,10528,3870), (145,10529,1), (908,9581,5187), (942,3419,377), (1737,3811,5552), (1788,3189,100), (3873,5086,388), (9581,11523,908), (10529,10530,10527)<br>
</p>
